mapper.sql: id, order_id, order_no, booking_customer_id, booking_customer_phone, customer_lv, rider_phone, driver_id, car_id, evaluate_score, evaluate, create_at, update_at, appraisal_status, remarks, instrument_and_service, environment_and_equipped, efficiency_and_safety, memo, create_by, update_by, platform_evaluate, platform_evaluate_score, platform_memo, customer_ip, point, pointBD, driver_phone, driver_name, license_plates, booking_customer_name, rider_name, type, order_type, service_type_id, service_type_name, city_id, city_name, order_create_time, order_finish_time, car_group_id, car_group_name, business_id, business_name, supplier_id, supplier_name
mapper.select:
SELECT id AS appraisalId, order_no AS orderNo, create_at AS createDate, evaluate_score AS evaluateScore, evaluate AS evaluate, memo AS memo, driver_id AS driverId, driver_name AS driverName, driver_phone AS driverPhone, license_plates AS licensePlates, appraisal_status AS appraisalStatus, order_finish_time as orderFinishTime, is_allowed_appeal as isAllowedAppeal, is_already_appeal isAlreadyAppeal, city_id cityId FROM customer_appraisal where id in
#{idItem}
